sense.def:
Milk
je bela tekočina, ki jo dajejo krave in koze. Ljudje jo pijejo ali predelujejo v maslo, sir in jogurt.

seg.quote: He only drinks milk in tea or coffee.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
milks a cow or goat
, od krave ali koze dobi mleko tako, da jo vleče za vime.

seg.quote: The men had milked the cows in the early morning.
He used to help the farmer with his milking.
I had to install milking equipment.

sense.def:
Milk
je tudi bela tekočina, ki nastaja v ženskih dojkah in jo pijejo dojenčki.

Kadar človek
milks a situation or place
, sebično izkoristi neki položaj ali kraj zase, kolikor le more.

seg.quote: The island was milked by the invaders for five centuries.
